item.title: Bottlenecks and Pull Requests
item.description: This post was originally a response to a long comment on the parent post about why “all PRs must point at main”. Let me start by saying my thinking is actually more of a belief.

item.title: Value Based Velocity
item.description: Ok so we want to measure our velocity in terms of value shipped, but how do you do that? Here is one such way. I encourage you to to take this and create a new sprint process for your team or (better yet) fit it into your current process.

item.title: How We Code Review
item.description: This has been written and rewritten a couple times for a handful of different teams. Consider it a starting place/template All of our engineering work makes it to production by first passing through a code review.

item.title: Velocity and Story Points
item.description: Right now in (zoom) conference rooms across the globe, some engineering manager or product manager is talking about, defending, or setting goals around Velocity ...

item.title: On Agility
item.description: We spend so much time focusing on how our teams can be agile. There are methods and books and classes and certificates and tons of arguments online about the pros and cons of one way versus another.
